skills.title: Desktop Software Development
skills.body: I have had experience in developing both command line and graphical user interface-based applications in a variety of programming languages, including Java and C++. Particularly interesting desktop applications I have been involved in developing include an emulator of the Manchester SSEM and a Graphical Interface for performing testing and monitoring of an I2C bus-based embedded device.

skills.title: Website Development
skills.body: I have been involved in the development of many websites, including designs for mock clients during my time at university. A recent task involved developing a Quiz website where university staff could make quizzes, then students could complete them.

skills.title: Database Systems
skills.body: Generally, when choosing a standard RDBMS, I have normally chosen to use MySQL. I have also used Cassandra in implementations where a NoSQL database system were appropriate.

skills.title: Software Engineering Methods
skills.body: I have participated in several projects where the agile and scrum techniques have been used to deliver regular iterations of a piece of software.
